data.app_name: Magical Doodle : Draw Your Dreams, Paint Your World
data.description:
Turn Your Room into a Canvas, Your Space into a Studio! Experience a New Dimension of Art with Just a Finger Touch.
Dive into the magical world of VR drawing! Unleash your creativity and cross the boundaries between reality and virtual art.

# Key Features:
**Canvas Selection**: Choose from AR mode, where your real room becomes the canvas, or VR mode, where you can draw in stunning virtual environments like starry skies, outer space, or underwater worlds.

**Draw with Fingertips**: Create art with simple hand gestures. Just move your fingers in the air to drawâ€”it's like magic! Experience intuitive and free expression.


**Variety of Pens**: Enjoy colorful art with 13 special pens, including stars, flames, hearts, and snowflakes.

**Animation Effects**: Watch your drawings appear and disappear like magic with 10 types of animations, offering amazing expressive power.

**Save and Load Your Work**: Save your precious artwork and load it anytime to continue creating from where you left off.

Use the Quest recording feature to share and showcase your animated masterpieces in videos!

Download now and transform your room or virtual space into a canvas to explore infinite possibilities!

This app is planned to become a paid service.
